text: @PMOIndia @narendramodi Hello sir I have a suggestion to fight with this Coronavirus please try to use chemicals used in making soaps and sanitizers.Mix chemicals used in sanitizing and soaps with other vaccines and inject in infected person to see the results.I donot know it works or not but plz try.
